title: Troubleshooting - Caller ID Showing Wrong Name
description: A customer reports that when they call people, the wrong name is appearing on the recipient's Caller ID.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's name as it is listed on the account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the correct name is on the account.

tasks.description: Check the public CNAM (Caller ID Name) database for the customer's number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the CNAM database has an old, incorrect name associated with the number.

tasks.description: Submit a request to update the CNAM database with the correct name.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the CNAM update request.
